summary: Tested new bulk operations, advanced filters, and 16 templates. All features working correctly.
seed_data_creation: None - used client-side stored lesson data
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 16 tested new features: 1) Bulk operations with checkbox icon button, bulk toolbar (Select All, Deselect All, Export, Delete), checkboxes on lesson cards - all working; 2) Advanced filters panel with Date Created (All Time/7 Days/30 Days/3 Months), Duration (Any/Short/Medium/Long), Scripture (All/OT/NT/Gospels/Psalms) - all working; 3) Templates page now has 16 templates including 6 new ones.

bulk_mode_button.notes: Checkbox icon button toggles bulk mode on/off

bulk_toolbar_select_all.notes: Select All button visible and selects all lesson cards

bulk_toolbar_deselect_all.notes: Deselect All button visible and deselects all

bulk_toolbar_export.notes: Export Selected button visible (downloads JSON file when clicked)

bulk_toolbar_delete.notes: Delete Selected button visible (shows confirmation dialog)

bulk_checkboxes_on_cards.notes: Found 8 checkboxes on lesson cards in bulk mode

advanced_filters_button.notes: Advanced button toggles filter panel visibility

date_created_filter.notes: Options: All Time, Last 7 Days, Last 30 Days, Last 3 Months

duration_filter.notes: Options: Any Duration, Short (< 30 min), Medium (30-45 min), Long (> 45 min)

scripture_filter.notes: Options: All Books, Old Testament, New Testament, Gospels, Psalms

new_templates.notes: All 6 new templates present: Creation Story, Daniel Lions Den, Jonah Whale, Ten Commandments, Jesus Walks on Water, Sermon on Mount
